title: Portugal Algarve Beach Escape with Six Restaurants & Bars, Three Outdoor Pools & Day Spa
description: Escape to a world of sunshine and sandy beaches along Portugal's dreamy southern coast with a stay at the five-star VidaMar Resort Algarve. Spend your days on stunning coastal walks, discovering secluded beaches and ocean caves, surfing the waves and exploring nearby Faro and Lagos, returning to the resort to slip into the massive outdoor pools for a refreshing dip. Order your favourite drink at the Tiki Bar, then tuck into a rich meal at one of three refined restaurants.
offer_address: Rua da Boca da Alagoa Lote 1, 8200-424 Guia, Portugal
